resources:
The authorization for all permissions has been confirmed
 Click "Initialize" and search for the matching Bluetooth. Search for Bluetooth matching results Bluetooth Setting Send Ble test data Start Navigation connected disconnect
SN Code Device Version Brightness Sound Device Sound GPS Speed Ratio Value
//T800Test-title Queue test Time(0x01)： Speed(0x02):
The empty icon in interface 0x04 must be sent first for it to take effect.
 The empty icon in interface 0x04 must be sent first for it to take effect.
 The empty icon in interface 0x04 must be sent first for it to take effect.
 The following two values can be sent or not sent.
 The input described in the document as 0 or 1, in fact, is a numerical value.
 LimitedSpeed1-Warning Point-1，LimitedSpeed-Warning Point-2
 When there is only a large warning bar, it reads the first one. Intercal Speed(0x03)：
Not a single value can be omitted. All must be passed. 
 If any is missing, the previous value will be displayed. Speeding(0x1B)： After checking several times, there was no response at all ？？？？？？ Warning Point(0x04)(0x0E)：
0x04：Small icon interface, allowing for the setting of up to 2 at a time
 0x0E：Large icon interface, one per time
 No problem. Just a lot of blank icons
 The values inside need to be sent over the speed interface 0x02 and the numbers should be limited
Reach(0x05)：
Just sending the distance will automatically display a fake timestamp
 All data must be sent. Additionally, the "type" field is not used and sending or not sending it is the same. Lane Information(0x06)：
Many issues must be called through three interfaces.
 Setting the automatic length will display data that seems to have originated from nowhere, with a large amount of cached data causing the display to be disordered.
 1：Type 00: Do not need to be sent.
 2：Type 01: By default, the last digit is not required to be pronounced. Even if it is pronounced, it will not be accepted.
 3：Type 02: One more person should be added. By default, it should be set as 00. Then the layout of the lines will be correct, otherwise there will be conflicts.

Highway lane information(0x06)： Turning information(0x07)： In the first turn information, namely the name of the road, the name of the next road should be set(0x08) Road information：(0x08)(0x14)
0x08: To set the next road, it is also necessary to set the turning information.0x07
 0x14：No problem. After the setting is completed, the lane information will be replaced.
GPS(0x09)(0x0D)(0xFD)： 0x09:The display of normal 1 and lost instruction 2 is exactly the same.？？？？？ Brightness：(0x0A)(0xFA)(0x18)
0x0A：Not sure if it is effective
 0xFA：There is a return value that is always 0
 0x18：Set the lighting to normal
Sound：(0xa1)(0xa2)(0x16)(0x17) Setting:(0xfb)(0x0C)(0xfc)(0x15)
0xfb:Querying the serial number instruction. 
 The conversion format of the provided DEMO code is incorrect.
 Just use the system is conversion format directly. 
 It is not ruled out that the provided DEMO is an expired and fake document.
 String sn= new String(data, StandardCharsets.UTF_8)
 0x0C：Write/Setup Serial Number Instruction, followed by 10 bytes
 0xfc：Query the software version. It is impossible to test whether the 6 bytes in the document are correct. After the program is modified, the automatic length can be set. The parsing is also the standard parsing, not the one in the DEMO. The code is written here. It is estimated that someone has changed the person or it has been found that the standard parsing is the most convenient. The style has been changed, and character length is no longer added.
 0x15:Factory Reset
Send Image:(0x10)(0x11)
0x10:Start by sending the start command, and end by sending the end command
 0x11：Visible and invisible real scene images
 The document is fake. The reply is not received
 There is no need to wait. Just make sure the order is correct. It is basically a standard Bluetooth file transfer
Statu Information：(0x12)(0x13)
0x12:Display the yellow status bar
 0x13:Flashing turn indicator icon
//T800Test-item 100 test instructions test time only send speed send all Set speed overrun display - random value Speed limit within the section Single random Two random ones Large size - Looping Send random time type Do not send time type Hidden driveway selective-access display 1-10 11-20 21-30 31-40 41-50 51-60 61-70 71-80 Set automatic length selective-access display Display 30 lanes Single random Two random ones Loop display Next lane: Test road name + random number Current Lane: Hide Name Current Lane: Destination Name Current Lane: Location Name Current Lane: Location Name Current Lane: Road Name close open lose Set random values for the GPS speed ratio:0-10 Query the GPS speed ratio value Set_Brightness_Auto Set_Brightness_to 1-10 randomly manually Query brightness Sunlight collection has been activated Sunlight collection is turned off Query SN Rewrite SN: T700+ Random 6-digit alphanumeric characters Query the device version information Restore factory settings Set random sound from 0 to 10 Query the volume level of the sound Startup alert sound: ON Startup alert sound: OFF Query startup alert tone Send Image-8kb Send Image-32kb Send Image-1.2MB Send Image-2.4MB-Landscape Show Image Hide Image Display the yellow status bar Hide the yellow status bar The icon is flashing on The icon is flashing off
